name: Survivor: Alien Attack I
description: This time the aliens invaded Survivor Island. The spacecraft Space 01, located in the middle of the island, is waiting to carry people captured as captives to their planets. Actually, the alien, a kind of robot, follows people. The aim of the alien is to move people to the spacecraft. But the players on the island will shoot and eliminate the aliens. As it is destroyed, aliens will come back from different parts of the island. In the elimination of each alien, 10 points will be gained and a heart will appear, 20 more points will be won. If the alien is not destroyed in time, the game will be played again from the beginning with the "re-play" button. In the game, the keyboard is fired with the f key, the w key is used to move the player and the shift + w keys. In the game there is a map of the island in the upper right corner, the white flags show the player's direction of movement and the green flags show the direction and location of the alien. It will be easier to destroy the alien by looking at these flags.
